strapiPost.title: NWA Businesses Fail ABC COVID-19 Regulations
strapiPost.content:
Several NWA bars and restaurants have failed to enforce the state's COVID-19 regulations.

  • The Arkansas Beverage Control conducted Covid compliance checks across the state between Monday, Dec. 28, and Jan. 3. The ABC found many of the local bars and restaurants were not enforcing social distancing or were serving drinks past the 11 p.m. cutoff. The full list of violators can be found HERE.
